frontmatter.description: reduce is arguably the most versatile of Javascript's array prototype methods. `reduce` gives you the power to create a new data structure by iterating over an array and applying a callback of your creation. By the end of this session, you will understand the basics of `reduce`, and feel confident using it to simplify your data.
frontmatter.title: Reduce

readingLinks.description: MDN is our go-to doc source on the fundamentals of the reduce API.
readingLinks.title: MDN docs on reduce

readingLinks.description: This article will help you with more complex reduce cases, and `reduce` your fear in the process.
readingLinks.title: Reducing your fears about reduce
